bgu.dcr.az.api.prob.cpack

Interface ConstraintsPackage

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConstraintPackage, AsymmetricBinaryMapConstraintPackage, BinaryMapConstraintPackage, KAryTreeConstraintPackage

    public interface ConstraintsPackage
    this class represent a data structure that hold and query about constraints

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addNeighbor(int to, int neighbor)
      add neighbor to the set of neighborer's belongs to 'to'
      void calculateCost(int owner, Assignment a, ConstraintCheckResult result)
      return the cost of the given assignment from the given owner point of view inside the parameter result the result parameter is an array of 2: [cost, number of constraint checks required]
      int calculateGlobalCost(Assignment a)
      calculate the cost relative to the system - means that this cost is calculated to be the sum of costs of all owners possible
      void getConstraintCost(int owner, Assignment k, ConstraintCheckResult result)
      K-ary version
      void getConstraintCost(int owner, int x1, int v1, ConstraintCheckResult result)
      Unary version

      Binary version
      java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> getNeighbores(int xi)
      return the set of neighbor's belongs to the variable xi

      Unary version

      K-Ary version
